metadata.title: Disney Couture Tinker Bell Pixie Hollow Necklace
features: Gold-plated with enamel detail and baby blue twisted rope chain.
Approx. 17" long with a hook clasp.
Not intended for children 13 yrs of age and younger
description: Please note: Not intended for children 13 yrs of age and younger.   Care Instructions:  -Always remove jewelry and/or hair accessories when washing hands, showering, or swimming. Moisture can cause crystals/stones to dull and become loose.  -Avoid spraying or applying any alcohol or oil-based products such as; perfume, hairspray, body lotions, cleansers or hair grooming products on or near the jewelry including hair accessory pieces. The alcohol or oil content will cause Lucite beads to crack, will dull the finish and loosen the crystals/stones, and cause metal parts to discolor or tarnish.  -Never expose jewelry or hair accessory pieces to extreme heat or direct sunlight over long periods of time as this can cause colors to fade.  -To clean your jewelry and hair accessories use a dry soft cloth. Never submerge in cleaning solution or water.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Item model number": "DYN0638", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "December 16, 2014", "Manufacturer": "Disney Couture"}
